name: No Jumping, Please!
description:
Description

No Jumping, Please! is a game about preventing people from getting away with jumping over the underground gates. You are a security guard, and you'll throw whatever you have at hand at them so they think twice before doing it next time.

Status

This game is currently in development, in what I would call an alpha phase.

Controls

The player moves with W/A/S/D and you can grab and throw things with Left Click.

Updates

The game won't be a lot bigger than this, but it certainly needs a menu (along with some configuration options), a loss situation and either a win situation or some kind of score. I will be fixing some reported bugs too. There WILL be more ideas added
